values: Sean Davis: Trump Shooting Update, & the Real Reason Congress Refuses to Investigate

It’s been six months since the Butler assassination attempt and we still know nothing about the man who shot Donald Trump, much less why he was allowed to do it. That should make you nervous. Sean Davis explains. 

(00:00) The Three Big Questions of the Trump Assassination Attempt
(06:39) The FBI Is Out of Control
(09:06) An Update About the Trump Shooter
(29:15) The Mass Incompetence of the Secret Service Counter-Snipers
(41:40) Who Really Shot the Trump Shooter?
(58:11) Strategic Incompetence
